cropHealth.title: Crop Health Analysis
cropHealth.subtitle: Upload crop images for AI-powered health assessment and recommendations
cropHealth.uploadInstructions: Click to upload or drag and drop
cropHealth.fileTypeError: Only JPG, PNG and WEBP formats supported
cropHealth.uploadPrompt: Upload an image for AI-powered crop health analysis
cropHealth.tip1: Ensure clear, well-lit photos of affected areas
cropHealth.tip2: Include both healthy and affected sections for comparison
healthyRecommendations: Maintain current care practices - crop shows optimal growth
Continue monitoring leaf color and growth patterns
Follow established irrigation and fertilization schedule
unhealthyRecommendations: Adjust care practices based on analysis findings
